title: Chapter III - Minimum Standards and Regulations for Management of Specialized Secure Juvenile Detention Facilities for Older Youth
content:
Chapter III - Minimum Standards and Regulations for Management of Specialized Secure Juvenile Detention Facilities for Older Youth

State Regulations

Part 7301 - LEGAL AUTHORITY (§ 7301.1)

Part 7302 - DEFINITIONS (§ 7302.1)

Part 7303 - Construction and Renovation (§ 7303.1 to 7303.2)

Part 7304 - Certification (§ 7304.1 to 7304.4)

Part 7305 - ADMISSIONS AND INTAKE (§ 7305.1 to 7305.9)

Part 7306 - SECURITY AND SUPERVISION (§ 7306.1 to 7306.16)

Part 7308 - VISITATION (§ 7308.1 to 7308.8)

Part 7309 - FOOD SERVICES (§ 7309.1 to 7309.9)

Part 7310 - HEALTH SERVICES (§ 7310.1 to 7310.12)

Part 7311 - MENTAL HEALTH SERVICES (§ 7311.1 to 7311.7)

Part 7312 - YOUTH PERSONAL HYGIENE (§ 7312.1 to 7312.9)

Part 7313 - CLASSIFICATION (§ 7313.1 to 7313.8)

Part 7320 - MAXIMUM FACILITY CAPACITY (§ 7320.1 to 7320.6)

Part 7322 - REPORTABLE INCIDENTS (§ 7322.1 to 7322.6)

Part 7326 - PRINTED MATERIAL AND PUBLICATIONS (§ 7326.1 to 7326.4)

Part 7328 - EXERCISE, RECREATION AND LEISURE ACTIVITIES (§ 7328.1 to 7328.5)

Part 7331 - ACCESS TO LEGAL SERVICES (§ 7331.1 to 7331.5)

Part 7332 - GRIEVANCE PROGRAM (§ 7332.1 to 7332.11)

Part 7334 - CORRESPONDENCE AND TELEPHONE (§ 7334.1 to 7334.7)

Part 7336 - RELIGION (§ 7336.1 to 7336.9)

Part 7342 - DEATHBED AND FUNERAL VISITS (§ 7342.1 to 7342.10)

Part 7346 - NONDISCRIMINATORY TREATMENT (§ 7346.1 to 7346.2)

Part 7350 - SANITATION (§ 7350.1 to 7350.8)

Part 7352 - FIRE PREVENTION AND SAFETY (§ 7352.1 to 7352.4)

Part 7354 - ENVIRONMENTAL HEALTH AND SAFETY (§ 7354.1 to 7354.9)

Part 7356 - GOOD BEHAVIOR ALLOWANCES AND SENTENCE CALCULATION (§ 7356.1 to 7356.2)

Part 7360 - VARIANCES (§ 7360.1 to 7360.4)

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
